Golden Fields07253kag86qmodbz0g73li817emal3ol3umu1784742015-03-22T03:01:44ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:Golden Fields.png|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of the Golden Fields on the continent of Essos.]]
The '''Golden Fields''' is a region in western [[Essos]]. This area is located between [[Dagger Lake]] and a tributary of the [[Rhoyne]]. The [[Flatlands]] lie to the north-west and the [[Disputed Lands]] and the [[Free City]] of [[Myr]] to the south-west.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/lys/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Lys entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Golden Fields are located in the same area. The tributary of the Rhoyne that lies along their south-western edge is called the Lhorulu.
